text: jin logo ne apne rub ke hukm ki baja aawari ki un ke liye bhalaai hai aur jin logo ne us ki hukm bardaari na ki, agar un ke liye zameen mein jo kuch hai sub kuch ho aur osi ke saath waisa hee aur bhi ho to wo sub kuch apne badle mein de de, yahi hai jin ke liye bora hisaab hai aur jin ka tikhaana jahannum mein jo bahuth bori jageh hai
